SEARCH
Module com.example.cincuentazo
Package com.example.cincuentazo.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.example.cincuentazo.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the core game logic for a card-based game. The game involves managing a main deck, table deck, player decks, active players, and the current table count. It handles the initialization of the game, card distribution, and deck shuffling.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numPlayers)
      Initializes a new game with the specified number of players. Each player is dealt an initial hand of four cards. The main deck is shuffled, and the first card from the deck is placed on the table to initialize the game.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players in the game.

  • Method Details

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck(ArrayList<Card> deck)
      Shuffles the specified deck of cards.
      Parameters:
      deck - The deck of cards to shuffle.

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      Draws a card from the main deck. If the deck is empty and there are enough cards on the table, it recycles the table cards into the main deck.
      Returns:
      The drawn card, or null if the main deck is empty after recycling.

    • getTableDeck

      public ArrayList<Card> getTableDeck()
      Retrieves the current cards on the table.
      Returns:
      A list of cards on the table.

    • getPlayerDeck

      public ArrayList<Card> getPlayerDeck(int playerIndex)
      Retrieves the deck of cards belonging to a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player whose deck is requested.
      Returns:
      The list of cards in the player's deck.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public int getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the index of the current player.
      Returns:
      The index of the current player in the active players list.

    • getTableCount

      public int getTableCount()
      Gets the current sum of card values on the table.
      Returns:
      The current sum of card values on the table.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Determines if the game is over, which happens when only one active player remains.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, otherwise false.

    • removeCardFromDeck

      public void removeCardFromDeck(int playerIndex, int cardIndex)
      Removes a specific card from a player's deck and adds it to the table.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player whose card will be removed.
      cardIndex - The index of the card to remove in the player's deck.

    • removeAllCardsFromDeck

      public void removeAllCardsFromDeck(int playerIndex)
      Removes all cards from a player's deck and adds them to the main deck. Removes the player from the game after their deck is emptied.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player whose cards will be removed.

    • drawCardForPlayer

      public Card drawCardForPlayer(int playerIndex, int cardIndex)
      Draws a card for a player and places it in their deck at a specified position.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player drawing a card.
      cardIndex - The index at which to insert the new card in the player's deck.
      Returns:
      The newly drawn card, or null if no card is available to draw.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(int playerIndex)
      Removes a player from the game, making them inactive.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player to be removed.

    • addToTableSum

      public void addToTableSum(int value)
      Adds a value to the current table sum.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to add to the table sum.

    • moveToNextPlayer

      public void moveToNextPlayer()
      Advances to the next player's turn in a circular manner.

    • getActivePlayers

      public ArrayList<Integer> getActivePlayers()
      Retrieves the list of active players in the game.
      Returns:
      A list of indices representing active players.
